strapiPost.title: Rakeem Boyd opts out of rest of 2020 season
strapiPost.content:
Rakeem Boyd, the three year running back for the Arkansas Razorback Football team, wearing the iconic number 5, has opted out of the rest of the 2020 season and declared his intentions to participate in the NFL draft.

  • In a surprise move, Rakeem Boyd opts out of the rest of the season and declares for the NFL draft. His personal statement released on twitter can be found HERE
  • Boyd had 82 rushing attempts this season for a total of 309 yards. He has over 2,000 career rushing yards as a running back for the Razorbacks. He will be missed.
